import*as React from'react';/**
 * Locker return cached mark.
 * If set to `true`, will return `true` in a short time even if set `false`.
 * If set to `false` and then set to `true`, will change to `true`.
 * And after time duration, it will back to `null` automatically.
 */export default function useLock(){var duration=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:250;var lockRef=React.useRef(null);var timeoutRef=React.useRef(null);// Clean up
React.useEffect(function(){return function(){window.clearTimeout(timeoutRef.current);};},[]);function doLock(locked){if(locked||lockRef.current===null){lockRef.current=locked;}window.clearTimeout(timeoutRef.current);timeoutRef.current=window.setTimeout(function(){lockRef.current=null;},duration);}return[function(){return lockRef.current;},doLock];}
